version().details: For standard Balancer contracts, returns a JSON representation of the contract version containing name, version number and task ID. See real examples in the deployment repo; local tests just use plain text strings.

returns._0: version The version string corresponding to the current deployed contract

version().notice: Return arbitrary text representing the version of a contract.

documentation.text: @notice Simple interface to retrieve the version of a deployed contract.
